long_description: The REI Gauze Refill Kit replenishes the sterile gauze of a typical, single-person first aid kit. The REI Gauze Refill Kit includes varying sizes of gauze pads to clean and protect wounds. Gauze sponges absorb fluids. Non-adherent wound pads offer a non-stick surface. 5 x 9 in. trauma pad offers extra absorbancy. 2 in. wide gauze roll can be used to add pressure and absorb fluids during wound dressing; gauze roll is 4.1 yards long.
short_description: The REI Gauze Refill Kit replenishes the sterile gauze of a typical, single-person first aid kit.
